description: Change of use from an existing outbuilding previously used for oil storage tanks to Garden Room/ Communal Space Office/ Sedum Roof Amenity Space.New use of garden room to remain ancillary to the wider use of the host block. New use would allow for a headquarters for the porters to operate from plus a community space plus provide a space for CCTV security monitoring system for the whole block with the proviso that the new use would remain ancillary to the management of the mansion block.Renovation to internal space with mezzanine floor, kitchenette and WC. Two new rooflights and new door. Sedum blanket to cover existing external concrete slab.Proposed works include installation of 2x new rooflights, new door, new lightweight metal mezzanine floor and staircase, new plumbing and drainage for wc/ wash basin / kitchenette. Refer to drg. 245.001
